website_summaries.verdict: A cute, versatile unit perfect for cooking plenty more than quesadillas.
pros: Compact design means that it doesn't take up much counter space and is easy to store
The model's nonstick and PFOA-free surfaces wipe down easily

customer_reviews.title: Blessing in disguise
customer_reviews.text: So as a proud owner of a dash mini, yes i was dupped into the mini. It was a blessing in disguise because i love it, but as the fam grows so must my pancakes. I read carefully to get this one which makes huge pancakes, its primary use, fried eggs, omelets and quesadillas which i have used it for in this week. It works great for everything, the only thing is temperature control is a little high on one side. I will get use to it as i use it more. Overall, i like it and recommend it
customer_reviews.author: douglas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grilled chees
customer_reviews.text: Made a perfect grilled cheese sandwich. Was faster and more effective at melting all the cheese (4 slices). Compact and easy to store so it will be a great addition to a travel trailer or rv.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & clean, but...doesn't do both sides of a pancake
customer_reviews.text: I got this specifically to do the "1 banana+1 egg" -type pancakes. It browns the side of the pancake on the bottom (touching the metal), but not the top. Usually I have to cook the pancake for 2 min., then flip it over and let what was previously the top cook for another minute to get it done. That's why the 4-stars instead of 5; it's excellent for anything else, like a sandwich, but not quite as excellent for a pancake because of having to cook two-sides at once, which was my main reason for buying it.
customer_reviews.author: FLNewGirl

customer_reviews.title: Dash griddle not clean
customer_reviews.text: I literally just took this Dash griddle out of the box to use for the first time tonight 8/31 and it’s clearly been used and not cleaned. I am very disgusted about this.
customer_reviews.author: kristy s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: The size is both positive and negative. It’s small and perfect for our camping trailer, but you can’t cook too much at once because it’s small. It’s the perfect size for my husband when he goes on hunting trips. I also love the message the company is promoting!
customer_reviews.author: JJHBFamilyof3

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile cooking. Very easy to clean and use too, so far it was used to cook omelets, pancakes, spam, and hotdogs.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Portable Convenience 🤙
customer_reviews.text: As described. Small enough to bring to work and easy to clean its non-stick surface. It heats from the top and bottom so cooking time is pretty fast. Only thing that could be added to improve the product is an off/on switch and heat adjustment, even if it's just High/Med/Low.
customer_reviews.author: Dmfedalizo

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it March 2nd it dies yesterday July 14... it's a great grill ... used it for everything loved loved it ... why did it just stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren LaDota

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful fast griddle cooker with closable lid.
customer_reviews.text: I love this 8-inch electric griddle cooker. It Cooks a chicken breast and sizzles it golden brown within minutes. I live in a small studio room with only my own makeshift kitchen and it makes my life wonderful for eggs in the morning paninis at noon and any kind of main dish dinner that you would normally broil or put in a fry pan. It makes a perfect burger and steak too. The 8-inch is perfect for one to two people. My favorite is taking corn tortillas and feeling them with whatever and sizzling them to a golden brown. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieO~

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooker for quick meals. I use a small drop of oil not PAM spray. This make it much easier to clean. I wish it had an on/off switch. You have to plug and unplug to turn it on and off. Makes great omlets, toast and grilled hot dogs. I cook small potatoes in my instant pot and store in the frig. then I cut them in half and brown them on this cooker. They are delish. great also for quesadillas.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Q

customer_reviews.title: 7 in cooking surface
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. I was hoping for at least an 8 in cooking. Surface as advertised but was disappointed to find that it is only about 7 in. Maybe next time I’ll try a 12 in pizza maker to get a larger cooking surface. This would be great if it had an 8 - 10 in cooking surface so I could also use it as a griddle.
customer_reviews.author: ChiHealing

customer_reviews.title: Easy, heats up quick!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy it is to use- just plug in & wait for the light to turn off & it’s ready to use. I used it to make grilled cheese sandwiches in the hotel during a recent trip. It’s small enough to pack in a suitcase or tote bag. I contemplated between this one and the mini, but I think the mini would have been too small for a slice of bread. Cons: It heats up really quick & there’s no temperature control. The grilled sandwich in the pic was done in under a minute. If you step away from it you’ll likely burn the food.
customer_reviews.author: CEA

customer_reviews.title: Hope it would last more than three months.
customer_reviews.text: Loved my griddle, however I ordered it the end of February 2020, and used it for my husband and I a couple times a week, and two days ago it quit working. It was so easy to use, easy clean up, great for making breakfast, or sandwiches. However, I would hope it would last more than three months.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE L REED

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these originally for us and my 2 grown children. After a couple of months ours stopped working. So I bought another one thinking it was a ‘bad’ unit. My daughter used hers for 2.5 months and now her’s is no longer working. Now I believe these are not made well at all. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Outside gets very HOT
customer_reviews.text: This appliance is low cost therefore it’s capabilities are limited. Quality is low. Outside gets very hot, no temp control. U continuously r opening and closing lid which again is very hot. U have no idea if done/ready or not. Cord does not fold away for storage. Cooking well is very shallow so you r limited as to what u can cook in it. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Got 8 inch size so could do more things
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on eggs and pancakes. Also use it to warm tortillas. May need to use parchment paper on bottom if heating filled tortilla unless you flip it over several times so filling or cheese will heat. Unit heats up quite fast. Am pleased with it. Use your common sense, check on cooking progress.
customer_reviews.author: Rusti W.

customer_reviews.title: Even heating best feature
customer_reviews.text: Even heating at just the right temperature makes it perfect for its intended use. Although the compact size of the Dash Griddle limits it to one-at-a-time items, it does an excellent job on grilled cheese sandwiches, quesadillas and individual pancakes. It's a bit awkward to clean, especially since the power cord is attached and a little difficult to manage while running water over the cooking surfaces. My wife "loves, loves. loves" it for making quesadillas because it's so much less trouble that using a frying pan and the even heating makes for a much better result.
customer_reviews.author: Sax Racer

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but I got a defective one.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pruduct. I used my daughter's every day for more than a month at her house. Ordered mine as soon as I returned home. Unfortunately it has a problem with the heat. It gets too hot too fast. Burns food to the point that smoke is produced soon after it starts to heat. It doesn't heat evenly. I will order another one but for this specific item I have asked a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Caribbean-sunpr

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product almost a month ago, and before writing a review , i wanted to use a few times. I did and love it!!! this item hasn't failed me. I absolutely love the practicality of it, the size and how easy it is to storage as it takes very little space. I would absolutely recommend this item. A+ in my book. :)
customer_reviews.author: Terika2002

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a month, right after the return window is closed. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and the sassy color just makes our family happy when we bring it out. Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Diana W.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within less than two months of use
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this, was great at first but light stopped indicating heat and popping noises were coming from inside of the element. Stopped using it for fear of a fire hazard
customer_reviews.author: EmmaJ

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking small meals simple.
customer_reviews.text: It would take a long time to burn most foods. This is why - cooker uses about 750 watts about 40% of the time. 350 watts about 30% of the time and zero watts about 30% of the time. So it never gets too hot. Since your food doesn't get burned the griddle is easy to clean. On the other hand, microwaving is about 4 times faster. Bu some foods do better when cooked the old fashioned way. You don't microwave pizzas waffles and hamburgers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to use, great for singles...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use (I place aluminum on bottom, place food to reheat and cover with more aluminum) but can also cook in it...too it on vacation, did a little grocery shopping & saved a bundle!
customer_reviews.author: L Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Last
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box after the 1st use, I would have given this Dash Round Griddle a 5 STAR review. It made the very BEST grilled cheese sandwiches. Sadly the thermostat no longer works. I'm now getting charred bread with the cheese not even close to being melted. The bread burns before the cheese has a chance to melt. Not worth the $$$. In the TRASH it goes. I wish AMAZON would stop SELLING this JUNK
customer_reviews.author: MyRowdyDawg

customer_reviews.title: It's too small
customer_reviews.text: This one is too small. It can only fry eggs, and it has to pay 5.99 freight to return the goods. There is no way to keep it. It's too small to be practical and prudent to buy.
customer_reviews.author: lisisi

customer_reviews.title: Fair value, cute color, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I searched local stores for something like this with no luck. I came across this online and it was exactly what I was looking for. I love the flat surface for grilled cheese/hot sandwiches. It works well, compact, cooks evenly and quickly. Hopefully it lasts a while. We used our last one (different brand) for a few years and it was used pretty frequently. Happy with it so far though.
customer_reviews.author: laurie cooksley

customer_reviews.title: Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure I would like it. Is now my favorite go-to kitchen appliance. Use it 3 times a week at least. Small, light weight. Heats up fast. Makes great hot sandwiches, bacon and eggs, pancakes. Nothing sticks to surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Real GoTo in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I use this several times a week as it makes excellent egg muffins. It fries and shapes the egg perfectly and I only use a spritz of oil. I also love to make grill cheese using English muffins.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ran

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, just watch your food!
customer_reviews.text: We got this product so my son could make his own quesadillas and grilled cheese. It does work and is very quick and easy. Only downside is there is no temerature control and it heats very quickly. So quickly in fact that if you're putting meat on your sandwich or quesadilla make sure the meat is heated up first. The bread will be done before the meat gets warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: It burns the bottom tortilla and barely cooks the top. It also is slightly too small for mid sized tortillas. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie Masaveg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have one of these. Easy clean up. Easy to use. My son loves it and doesn't cook much so this may help expand his culinary skills. The only drawbacks is how hot the top gets. Just be aware of that. One suggestion would be for it to come with a quick cheat sheet on how long it takes to cook things. It is a guessing game. Once we use it more, we will create our own list of how long it takes to cook an egg, make grilled cheese, toast, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jane

customer_reviews.title: Usefull for so many things.
customer_reviews.text: I love this.use for breakfast lunch and dinner.i use this several times a week.ham.bacon.eggs.hamburgers.grilled sandwich. Hashbrowns.love it.highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Very useful little gadget. I use it for making egg omelet, toasting bread, roasting nuts, warming tortillas- that's a lot of functions for this little gadget. I prefer an Iron skillet for pan cakes as this one doesn't heat as much as an iron skillet. As it can stand vertically when not in use, it doesn't take much counter space at all unlike other kitchen appliances. The non-stick surface is still good after almost a year. Cleaning is easy, just wipe with a wet paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: SGG

customer_reviews.title: Cool addition
customer_reviews.text: I love Dash products. I got this to make quesadillas and it's awesome. Unlike the other styles that pinch them into sections this let's me load them full without squishing everything out! I also make tiny pizzas in it using premade crusts, the cheese doesn't brown much but it's great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: AllianceMommy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I love it and have been doing my eggs and other food and it just is fast and great easy to use nothing complex and just follow the direction
customer_reviews.author: Rta

customer_reviews.title: Nice big space
customer_reviews.text: This heats up fast and works perfectly, I wish it had temperature control tho... if you want to make something the thickness of two slices of bread or thinner, you will have to turn it manually because it wont make full contact with the top plate. on the plus side, plenty of room for well-packed sandwiches!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for quesadillas and crepes! it is of perfect size; durable; cute; and bakes well!
customer_reviews.author: Anoushka

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It burned one side of everything I cooked in it
customer_reviews.author: Sana Behtarin Azimi

customer_reviews.title: How hit the unit is.
customer_reviews.text: I only cook for myself and it comes in handy for cooking a small steak, a hamburger patty and other things like a piece of a ham slice. I wouldn't recommend it for elderly seniors because it cooks at high temperature and if they don't take proper precautions they could badly burn thrmselves.
customer_reviews.author: Mem05

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has this maker. She loves to make quesadillas and grilled cheeses in it. It is an easy way to make lunch. My only complaint is that you have to flip the food. It does not cook both sides at the same time. Also it is not big enough to fit a full size tortilla. It was a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Dietzenbach

customer_reviews.title: Woryh
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for pancakes and grilled cheese. Haven't tried anything else yet but I'm really happy with this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks like it is supposed too.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for cooking in hotels out on road trips with the family. My daughter cooked pancakes and breakfast sausage on this griddle and it cooked the food well. We also like that it is small and easy to pack into small places. Overall we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Waters

customer_reviews.title: Love this and wish I had 4 of them 👍 perfect pancakes
customer_reviews.text: I can’t make pancakes to save my life! Having more time to cook during lockdown I thought I would try this. It is awesome! I even make grilled cheese sandwich in it for my son. I wish I had 4 of them so I don’t have to wait for one at a time but that’s ok 👍
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and heats things up quickly
customer_reviews.text: Making toasts with this versatile machine is much easier than using a conventional oven given that with the latter you have to pay close attention to otherwise you burn the toasts. I also use the griddle to heat up empanadas, which takes maybe 5 mins. What’s best - it fits nicely into the cabinet without occupying too much space. Totally worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is absolutely fantastic! I love it! I don't know what took me so long to discover this. It is perfect for cooking eggs over easy, never need to flip the eggs. The possibilities are endless. Don't hesitate, this little griddle makes cooking fun again!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Pomainville

customer_reviews.title: Evenly cooks breakfast foods. Opening handle gets hot tho
customer_reviews.text: I love how it cooks eggs and pancakes. Fairly easy to clean. I don't like that the closure clip gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: Tink

customer_reviews.title: Fast heating up! work amazing! easy to clean! Love it and enjoy cooking with it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to toast bagels or bread every morning for my family! So easy to clean! Fast heating up! For pancake, It works amazing! This will give you perfect pancake without using any oil!!! The nonstick coat work amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kim A. Le

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Nice item, easy to clean, doesn’t take much space, works great! Package includes well written manuals and a short recipe book - nice touch! Love it! Arrived quickly. Made a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Detka123

customer_reviews.title: Works well but no on off swich
customer_reviews.text: I use it at breakfast,BUT there is no on and off switch—— only clicking sound !!! You have to be careful ,But I use every morning——— Don’t forget. I gave it 4 star because it work well!!! Except for swich
customer_reviews.author: michael Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My husband like it. I use it cook pancakes for my husband, em... delicious 😋
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooker
customer_reviews.text: A little of the non-stick coating is coming off after a few months of use. You can't control the temperature but that doesn't seem to matter. It cooks things up just fine. It's a good little appliance and overall I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mini grill!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for quesadillas burgers and pancakes!!!! Easy to clean and fast warning!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best little grill
customer_reviews.text: Love my dash it's perfect for .I'm on oxygen so I can't use gas stove ect and I csn make panckes and grilled cheese sandwich. Love how small .
customer_reviews.author: Susan  Rickard.. Robert Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Functional, easy to clean, works great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grill, great for burgers, grilled cheese, etc. Nice size, not too big or too small, like the color, easy to clean. Good for meals for one or two people, not for making a meal for a large family.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: I cook omelettes, grilled cheese, quesadillas, almost anything that will fit in here. This little kitchen appliance is so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot (or should i say too hot to control!)
customer_reviews.text: Not as impressed. No temp control, has burned everything ive cooked. Dont recommend. Other grills are better...
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: 😊
customer_reviews.text: Live it. Make things easier to do without turning on the oven
customer_reviews.author: Candra

customer_reviews.title: Best Griddle Ever
customer_reviews.text: I just bought one to replace my old one ghat lasted me about 4 years. I use it daily more than anything else in my kitchen. It’s great for sandwiches but also perfect for pancakes
customer_reviews.author: Cole Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for small quick meals🍛❗️
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick small meals!👨🏾‍🍳 It gets very hot 🤬 use with caution
customer_reviews.author: BEA 🐻 🐻

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t heat well at all. I tried to make a pancake and the bottom cooked, but not the top. I had to flip it my self. Might as well use a pan. It also took forever to cook. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kya

customer_reviews.title: Best Griddle & Saves Space
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It does cook fast, prepare your food then plug in! Everyone needs this in their home
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This makes amazing eggs for sandwiches or omlets! Excited to try more meals on this thing. It'll deffinitly help me eat better healthy foods for sure
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Cute, space-saving, griddle. No temp control, but haven't had an issue with it being too hot or not hot enough - it works exactly as they describe it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product not exactly safe.
customer_reviews.text: First thing noticed screws loose inside cover that closes griddle. Extreme heat was scolding got to even finish pancakes. Not all that.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Hunter I was charged and forced to purchase 2 of same product the second wont do this twice.

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT WILL NOT GO OFF AFTER HEATING UP.
customer_reviews.text: LIGHT WILL NOT GO OFF AFTER HEATING AND FRONT LEGS R LOWER THAN BACK SO HAVE TO PROP UP TO LEVEL SO OIL WILL NOT RUN OFF.
customer_reviews.author: GDAN

customer_reviews.title: Small cute easy
customer_reviews.text: There is no tempature control you just plug in and check your food. Easy for my teen to use. It’s great for simple small things. We love it super cute easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica p.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: You would have to complete fill this unit with batter in order for it to brown on both sides. Too much space between top and bottom cooking surfaces. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: glenn watters

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my quesadilla loving 16-yr-old. This maker is very easy to use and easy to clean. I’m glad I chose this brand.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever !
customer_reviews.text: This product is used for many different things and I love it. It's easy to clean, easy to store when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl A Siebert

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is very good, and it comes with a side dish manual! It is very convenient to make an omelette!
customer_reviews.author: Haoyou

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! Pancakes, grilled cheese, quesadillas, you name it. It is really easy to clean up and heats up fast
customer_reviews.author: Shwna

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for your buck
customer_reviews.text: In love with this product. I do pancakes, bacon, omelettes and it cooks evenly and fast
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Acosta

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This girdle stopped working after half a year. The temperature control on this product is horrible, and the "waterproof" surface got scratched after the second use. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! I advise no one buy this girdle as it is cheaply made and not made well.
customer_reviews.author: Julia King

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked for longer
customer_reviews.text: Im very sad to write this i bought this in May this year and ive had it for about 3 months and it has stopped working, i tried to get a replacement but it wasnt given to me so now i need to get another one they are giving me a partial refund since its past the 30 day refund but i didnt care for the refund i just wanted a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: One half of the griddle burns everything that I cook, the other half not.
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT non-stick. Food sticks to the surface and half of it is always burned.
customer_reviews.author: tsveta

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good size. I use this a lot. Sandwiches, quesadillas, pancakes. Great breakfast/snack tool
customer_reviews.author: Joanna B. Viteri

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great!! I’ve had it for 2 days and already made eggs, bacon, and quesadillas on it with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this item! We made pancakes in iron minutes and cleaned it in 30 seconds. The packaging is very nice too. I would definitely recommend this product and this brand to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Pauli

customer_reviews.title: Dash express griddle
customer_reviews.text: I love Dash products. I have bought all 3 and I’m so glad I did. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: Do not enjoy using his as much as the mini waffle maker!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FLUFFY PANCAKES
customer_reviews.text: i LOVE this product. The only thing i have used it for is pancakes and eggs. And let me tell you it is PERFECT. You dont have to worry about breaking your eggs and it makes perfect fluffy pancakes. The only thing is you can not adjust the temperature but it heats up perfect so you dont have to wait too long for your food
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Quick meal
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I could adjust the heat, but besides that it's perfect for doing a quick cook without needing to dirty the dishes
customer_reviews.author: VarahT

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: got to get another one for me! So it is GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Not quick heating or cooking.
customer_reviews.text: It takes awhile for it to heat up and cook the batters
customer_reviews.author: D. MIKOLAY

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Made quesadillas in it and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great size.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. I misunderstood. I thought the griddle would lay flat and you could cook on both sides. Other than that really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dodie

customer_reviews.title: Best little griddle
customer_reviews.text: Can so evgs, bacon quesadillas. Hamburger , hotdog. Even a small omelet. Have bougjt 4 for gifts
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good products..
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT..it get hot faster and cook well the food..highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Lene

customer_reviews.title: Can't Live Without This!!
customer_reviews.text: nice color, works Wonderfull, extremely versatile, cooks everything! Perfect for Rooming houses, hotel rooms, man caves! Totally indespensible!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Driver

customer_reviews.title: Oh, the fun I'm having with this!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, perfect size for me! Easy to clean, stores easily and works great...and it's cute! Heated too as well...perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: ITS REALLY COMING HANDY TO DO THINGS FAST ,I LIKED IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the air fryer, skillet, and rice cooker. Love them all. I’m a OTR truck driver with limited space. Perfect for me. Food comes out great. And hubby and I are eating healthier. Ty Dash. Highly recommend “Dash”. Can’t beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Brudog

customer_reviews.title: A handy little tool.
customer_reviews.text: It’s quick and efficient, for making a small single meal.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my son who loves to cook. He absolutely loves this. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Koty

customer_reviews.title: Little griddle, big help
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and practical. Helps a lot for quick breakfast in a busy day.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Small but handy
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is surely handy but if you cook more than 1 or 2 different items for breakfast, get a bigger griddle.

customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! It is so versatile and heats up quick and cleans easy!!

customer_reviews.text: Works great for my pancakes an my flour taco shell's heats up great

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: We love Dash products! We also have the waffle maker and they are both super convenient and easy to use. Also super versatile.

product_meta.title: Dash DMG8100AQ 8” Express Electric Round Griddle for Pancakes, Cookies, Burgers, Quesadillas, Eggs & other on the go Breakfast, Lunch & Snacks, with Indicator Light + Included Recipe Book, Aqua
product_meta.description: Color:AquaWhip up juicy burgers, cheesy quesadillas and much more with the Dash Express Griddle. Ideal for college dorms and cozy apartments, this small electric griddle stores easily in any kitchen. The PFOA-free nonstick cooking surfaces feature even heating technology for precise temperature control, so you can cook your ingredients perfectly. No assembly necessary. Just plug in the Express Griddle and you’re ready to cook! With an ample cooking surface for a variety of recipe options, prepare delicious meals quickly without the mess, and enjoy the versatility and convenience of the Dash Express Griddle.
feature_bullets: MORE THAN PANCAKES: Make eggs, cookies, pancakes, grilled cheese, even stir fry, burgers and quesadillas without the need for multiple pots/pans! Great for kids or on the go!
COMPACT + PORTABLE: 8” Express Electric Round Griddle takes up minimal counter space and is a MUST-HAVE for that first apartment, smaller kitchen, college dorm life, or camper/RV traveling

QUICK + EASY: Simply plug it in and wait for indicator light to turn off; it heats up in mere minutes. The dual PFOA-free, non-stick surfaces provide an even cook for consistent results, each and every time

PERFECT GIFT: The perfect wedding or new home gift. Its small size takes up little counter space, and its sleek design and trendy color options will match any kitchen décor (add to your registry now!)

INCLUDES: Backed by a 1-year manufacturer warranty, the 760 watt Dash 8” Express Round Griddle includes anti-slip feet, nonstick heating plates, recipe book and recipe database access (all non-electric parts are easily wiped clean)
